name: Super E.T.
overview: An exciting game of skill, chance and luck that the whole family can enjoy, by helping E.T. to phone home. The object of the tame is to try to help E.T. build his transmitter. You can do this by successfully opening garbage cans and finding parts to the transmitter, but beware there may a hunter in the garbage can and he will try to hunt down and kill E.T. You must avoid the hunter or E.T. won't make it! Once you have the parts and are told to go to the Elliots, you must act right away and go to Elliot's door to save your extra-terrestrial friend.
